select a.menu_id id, a.menu_title title, a.menu_url href, case when a.menu_url = '#' then '0' when nvl(a.menu_url, '#') != '#' and a.parent_id is null then '0' when b.role_menu_id is not null then '1' else '0' end checked, #{disabled} disabled, '0' spread from sys_menu a left join sys_role_menu b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id and b.role_id = #{roleId} where a.is_enable = '1' and a.menu_type in ('1', '2', '3')
and a.parent_id is null
and a.parent_id = #{parentId}
order by a.menu_order

select case when count(1) > 0 then '1' else '0' end dataAuthority from sys_menu a, sys_role_menu b where a.menu_id = b.menu_id and b.role_id = #{roleId} and a.menu_id = '20190000000000' and a.is_enable = '1' and a.menu_type = '4'

select case when count(1) > 0 then '1' else '0' end dataAuthority from sys_menu a, sys_role_menu b, sys_user_role c where a.menu_id = b.menu_id and b.role_id = c.role_id and c.user_id = #{userId} and a.menu_id = '20190000000000' and a.is_enable = '1' and a.menu_type = '4'

select a.menu_id menuId, a.parent_id parentId, a.menu_title menuTitle, a.menu_url menuUrl, a.menu_icon menuIcon from sys_menu a, sys_role_menu b, sys_user_role c where a.menu_id = b.menu_id and b.role_id = c.role_id and c.user_id = #{userId} and a.is_enable = '1' and a.menu_type in ('1') and a.menu_url is not null
and a.parent_id is null
and a.parent_id = #{parentId}
order by a.menu_order

select a.menu_id menuId, a.parent_id parentId, a.menu_title menuTitle, a.menu_url menuUrl, a.menu_icon menuIcon from sys_menu a where a.is_enable = '1' and a.menu_type in ('1') and a.menu_url is not null
and a.parent_id is null
and a.parent_id = #{parentId}
order by a.menu_order

select a.menu_id menuId, a.parent_id parentId, a.menu_title menuTitle, a.menu_url || '?menuId=' || menu_id || '&menuTitle=' || menu_title menuUrl, a.menu_icon menuIcon from sys_menu a where a.menu_type in ('1') and a.menu_url is not null order by a.menu_order
